name: interactive-story-starter
description: A starting point to build your own interactive stories using the Elm Narrative Engine
author: Jeff Schomay

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && copyfiles -f ./public/* ./dist && copyfiles -f ./public/img/* ./dist/img/ && copyfiles -f ./public/styles/* ./dist/styles && copyfiles -f ./public/styles/fonts/* ./dist/styles/fonts && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/elm.js
